# Graphql Attributes

## graphql.operation.name

The name of the operation being executed.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `findBookById` |

## graphql.operation.type

The type of the operation being executed.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `query` |
